description:
As the artist Manafest I've sold over 300,000 albums worldwide over 1,000,000 singles and toured over 20 different countries.

I currently have over 26,000 followers on Twitter and have used it to promote my music sell merchandise plus engage a loyal fanbase.

Twitter is a must for any artist or business owner promoting their brand and looking to make an impact online.

Twitter has 320 million active users in over 1 Billion unique tweets across multiple websites and 79% of the accounts are outside of the U.S.

Currently, Twitter doesn't require you to pay to have your posts seen by your followers.

If you are not yet using Twitter to build a targeted loyal following on Twitter your crazy!

I "take you by the hand" and "behind the scenes" and show you everything to grow your brand on Twitter, explaining it in simple detail with videos and written support lectures.

See exactly why I'm so successful with Twitter - see the stats in the free preview videos, below).

  • See inside my Twitter account
  • Brand your Instagram account and stand out from your competition
  • Locate & Grow your audience quickly - get more favorites, and engagement with your audience.
  • Nothing is left out - you see everything
  • ... and my help and assistance to Udemy students is legendary

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
title: Twitter Marketing Mastery For Music & Business
